edu.uiuc.ncsa.security.storage.sql

Class DBInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uiuc.ncsa.security.storage.sql.SQLDatabase
      • edu.uiuc.ncsa.security.storage.sql.DBInitializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Initializable

    public abstract class DBInitializer
extends SQLDatabase
implements Initializable
    A class that automates the creation of tables and indices for an SQL database. This implements the Initializable interface to manage create, init and destroy correctly. Note that init and destroy are scoped at the schema level, that is to say destroy does not remove a database, just a given schema within the database.

    Created by Jeff Gaynor
    on May 9, 2010 at 1:05:53 PM
